mean_cn: adj. 行为学的，行为性的
mean_en: of or relating to  the scientific and objective study of animal behavior especially under natural conditions
word_etyma: etho=ethos气质，习惯 + logical ...学的 → adj. 行为学的；行为性的
sentence: The ethological study of penguins helped us learn how they survive the cold climate.
sentence_trans: 企鹅行为学研究帮助我们了解它们如何在寒冷气候中生存。
